center.h4: Cumby ISD News Release April 17, 2020 COVID-19 (Coronavirus) Today, Governor Abbott ordered all schools to remain closed the remainder of the school year. Please see school news for additional information
Order of the Board of Trustees of Cumby ISD Postponement of May 2, 2020 Election due to COVID-19

div.p: On Tuesday, March 24th, 2020 the Cumby Board of Trustees voted to postpone the May 2nd bond election. The election will take place on November 3rd, 2020. Early election dates are: October 19-30

div.h4: CISD Closure for Year Posted Date: 04/16/2020

div.class: custom_151744 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0
custom_133869 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0
custom_124049 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0
div.p: Today, Governor Abbott ordered all schools to remain closed the remainder of the school year. This means that we will not physically return to school; however, we will continue to provide instruction. Therefore, school is continuing in the current manner, and students are expected to continue completing and returning work. We are looking at options for High School graduation and other school celebrations. We are planning summer school and summer learning options for students needing that support. More information will be sent out on these things in the coming days.

Please continue to stay mindful of social distancing and other safety protocols. Students, we love you and miss you. Parents and community, we applaud you for all of your support and dedication. Remember stay safe, stay healthy, and GO Trojans!!!

div.class: custom_49653 img-responsive no-border col-md-12 wow animated 0

p.span: Cumby ISD is happy to announce we will have open enrollment for Pre-K and Kindergarten.

span.span: To enroll your child at Cumby ISD please bring a copy of the following documents. All documents must be presenterd to enroll your child. Return your enrollment packets (see below) and verifying documents to the elementary office. There will be a box to collect your packets in the office. School hours are Tue-Thurs. 9am-12pm. If you have any questions please email Kady.talley@cumbyisd.net

p.span: All Shot Records Up to Date
proof of residency in the district
Please access the enrolment packet here click here.
